trans-unit.source: The Windows Azure Import/Export service REST API includes the operations described in the following table:
trans-unit.target: The Windows Azure Import/Export service REST API includes the operations described in the following table:

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the service document, which describes the resources exposed by the Windows Azure Import/Export service.
trans-unit.target: Retrieves the service document, which describes the resources exposed by the Windows Azure Import/Export service.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the service metadata document, which describes the complete data model for the resources exposed by the Windows Azure Import/Export service.
trans-unit.target: Retrieves the service metadata document, which describes the complete data model for the resources exposed by the Windows Azure Import/Export service.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of locations to which you can ship the disks associated with an import or export job.
trans-unit.target: Returns a list of locations to which you can ship the disks associated with an import or export job.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of storage accounts for which one or more import or export jobs have been created for a subscription.
trans-unit.target: Returns a list of storage accounts for which one or more import or export jobs have been created for a subscription.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new job in the Windows Azure Import/Export service.
trans-unit.target: Creates a new job in the Windows Azure Import/Export service.

trans-unit.source: Updates specific properties of a job.
trans-unit.target: Updates specific properties of a job.

trans-unit.source: Can be used to update job state to <languageKeyword>Shipping</languageKeyword> or to cancel a job.
trans-unit.target: Can be used to update job state to <languageKeyword>Shipping</languageKeyword> or to cancel a job.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about an existing job from the Windows Azure Import/Export service.
trans-unit.target: Gets information about an existing job from the Windows Azure Import/Export service.

trans-unit.source: Lists active and completed jobs for a subscription.
trans-unit.target: Lists active and completed jobs for a subscription.

trans-unit.source: Deletes an existing job, purging the related data from the system.
trans-unit.target: Deletes an existing job, purging the related data from the system.
